title: Seven Samurai 1954 1080p Bluray x265 LION
description:
Source:
Seven.Samurai.1954.1080p.CC.Bluray.x264-GCJM
============================================

This is the nature of war: by protecting others, you save yourself

=======

Shichinin no samurai
 
http://lookpic.com/O/i2/961/MryFq7KH.jpeg

=======
 
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0047478/  
https://www.rottentomatoes.com/m/1018639-seven_samurai/  
http://www.criterion.com/films/165-seven-samurai  
http://www.blu-ray.com/movies/Seven-Samurai-Blu-ray/7737/  
http://www.allrovi.com/movies/movie/v43855  
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Seven_Samurai

=======

A poor village under attack by bandits recruits seven unemployed samurai to help them defend themselves.

=======

Encoded from the 207 minute Criterion blu-ray release.

Included Audio Commentaries :

* Japanese film expert Michael Jeck, which was
recorded exclusively for Criterion in 1988.

* Scholars and critics David Desser, Joan Mellen,
Stephen Prince, Tony Rayns, and Donald Richie
discussing Seven Samurai, recorded between 2005 and 2006.

=======

http://www.criterion.com/cur...-and-sixteenth-century-japan

Criterion Essay : David Ehrenstein, Seven Samurai  
http://www.criterion.com/current/posts/19-seven-samurai

The Hours and Times: Kenneth Turan, Kurosawa and the Art of Epic Storytelling  
http://www.criterion.com/cur...the-art-of-epic-storytelling
